attributes.action: Take a more bipartisan approach to management of both  Education and the National Health Service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That this current government recognise that the todays general public are sick to death of watching politicians constantly playing with our Education system and the NHS for their own political ends to the detriment of both services. It should recognise that it is time to take both Education and the NHS out of the political arena and form a more bipartisan approach. Creating a management system that could consist both of members of the main political parties in equal proportion and also of knowlegeable members of the public.
